channel.title: Need help adding new items to a Matrix 718 base (Rune-Evo)
channel.description:
I downloaded this PS https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,600005.0.html
I've added about 200 items to a Hybrid PvP source about 2 years ago, but completely forgotten how I did it, and from what I can tell, this 718 base's files are much different.
I had googled around for hours and can't find a way to do it.
Just want to know how to add an item, and add stats to it, as well as how to take a current item and recolour it and readd as a new item.
Thanks, Idznak

item.title: Need help adding new items to a Matrix 718 base (Rune-Evo)
item.dc:creator: @Idznak Idznak
item.description:
@Idznak wrote:

I downloaded this PS https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,600005.0.html

I’ve added about 200 items to a Hybrid PvP source about 2 years ago, but completely forgotten how I did it, and from what I can tell, this 718 base’s files are much different.

I had googled around for hours and can’t find a way to do it.

Just want to know how to add an item, and add stats to it, as well as how to take a current item and recolour it and readd as a new item.

Thanks,
